attributes.action: put a stop to fortnightly bin collections and remain with weekly ones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fortnightly bin collections will leave our streets in an even worse state than they allready are. If the plans to banish the weekly bin collections go ahead then we will be faced with maggots, flies, animals, bad smells, mice, rats and countless hygiene issues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
